metadataAttributes.Title: Introduction to Cybersecurity Tools & Cyber Attacks
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This course gives you the background needed to understand basic Cybersecurity.  You will learn the history of Cybersecurity, types and motives of cyber attacks to further your knowledge of current threats to organizations and individuals.  Key terminology, basic system concepts and tools will be examined as an introduction to the Cybersecurity field.
